title: Teen charged as adult in fatal shooting of teenage girl
content:
ST. LOUIS (KTVI) - A 15-year-old is now charged as an adult for the shooting death of a teenage girl last January. Police say Ja'Mare Stewart shot and killed 14-year-old Jamyha Luss.
Luss was shot in the back while at a friend’s house in north St. Louis.
Stewart was charged with involuntary manslaughter and was certified to stand trial as an adult Tuesday
